definition: one-sided lovesickness/unrequited longing
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to think/to consider

sentences.english: Although I only am the unrequited love, no matter what, I had loved you.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我只是单相思，不管怎样，曾经我是爱过你的。

sentences.english: When section of unrequited love ended, I did not know that was says the sound regret to her.
sentences.chinese: 当一段单相思结束，我不知是跟她说声抱歉。

sentences.english: In summer of 2011, single Taurians will experience unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 到了2011年夏天，单身牛牛会经历单相思。
你是希特勒单相思的情人。

sentences.english: He falls in love very easily and often it's unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 他总是很快爱上某人，而且往往是单相思。
你是希特勒单相思的情人。

sentences.english: I begin to suspect that this is a one sided love.
sentences.chinese: 我开始怀疑，这是一种单相思。

sentences.english: From that evening on, Jack kept thinking of Mary and suffering from one-sided love.
sentences.chinese: 从那天晚上起，杰克一直想著玛丽并且为单相思所苦。

sentences.english: I think it's a story about an unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这是一个单相思的故事。

definition: unrequited love/one-sided love
to be secretly in love with
to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
one's own wishful thinking
lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: lovesickness
first love
destined to meet but not fated to be together (idiom)
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
affectionate/an affectionate person
to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
sweetheart/one's beloved
